<a id="RichTextEffect"></a>

# RichTextEffect

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A custom effect for a [RichTextLabel](RichTextLabel.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A custom effect for a [RichTextLabel](RichTextLabel.md), which can be loaded in the [RichTextLabel](RichTextLabel.md) inspector or using [RichTextLabel.install_effect()](RichTextLabel.md#RichTextLabel_method_install_effect).

\ **Note:** For a **RichTextEffect** to be usable, a BBCode tag must be defined as a member variable called ``bbcode`` in the script.




```gdscript
    # The RichTextEffect will be usable like this: `[example]Some text[/example]`
    var bbcode = "example"
```


```csharp
    // The RichTextEffect will be usable like this: `[example]Some text[/example]`
    string bbcode = "example";
```




\ **Note:** As soon as a [RichTextLabel](RichTextLabel.md) contains at least one **RichTextEffect**, it will continuously process the effect unless the project is paused. This may impact battery life negatively.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="RichTextEffect_private_method__process_custom_fx"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_process_custom_fx**\ (\ char_fx\: [CharFXTransform](CharFXTransform.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#RichTextEffect_private_method__process_custom_fx)

Override this method to modify properties in `char_fx`. The method must return ``true`` if the character could be transformed successfully. If the method returns ``false``, it will skip transformation to avoid displaying broken text.
